thread.section_title: Kensington Gardens Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Highly recommended
thread.title_full: Highly recommended - Review of Kensington Gardens Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MerlowCat
title: Highly recommended
text:
The Hotel is lovely and well worth the price.
I contacted them before I arrived in London to ask if I could tentatively extend my stay from the two nights I originally booked. The wonderful staff contacted me and said they would keep a room if they had a cancelation.
I can't speak highly enough of the beautiful lady on reception, she was full of advice and could answer all my questions.
The hotel is immaculately clean, the rooms are small but perfect for the solo traveller and the bed is very comfortable. The bathroom is modern and the shower is hot.
This hotel delivers everything I required with a friendly welcoming professionalism.
